trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ponce
There were no other sightings in Ponce on or around March 3rd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsEarly in the evening (7:15 p.m.)of last Saturday, March 3,2007, my family and I were watching the lunar eclipse when I saw a bright big light coming from the center of the island moving on a southeast direction. All of us saw the light (we were 5). The light was too high to be an helicopter and too low to be a satelite. The most strange thing was that it did not had any strobe light and that suddenly it disapeared from our sight.
